Description: hey there, up for grabs is a vintage late 80's B.C. Rich Platinum St-III guitar is in acceptable functional overall physical condition with chips, scuffing, cracks, dents, scratches, and a major repair guitar has small stress cracks around the neck, chips/indentions on the bottom of the body, scratches on the lower portion of the body, pick marks, scratches around the strap holders, missing paint/chips in middle of body, large portion of indentions in center of body, damaged pickup rings, replaced brass nut, missing locking nuts. and worst of all, the neck was damaged and repaired very well. function of the truss rod is unknown due to nature of repair. "It fell off the display wall. There are some dents, but it still plays beautifully." Was the only response from deadbeat seller. Please view all photos, I will be happy to send more pictures! All hardware is stock just as it was out of the factory. Excellent action, straight neck includes: Original Gotoh Tuning pegsSingle Locking Floyd Rose ( without all 3 Original Locking Nuts) original pickupsCurrently setup in drop A tuning with cleartone monster 14-80 strings *(brass nut Was Ground Out to fit such large strings, A replacement will be necessary) * Features a Coil tap/Coil selector that alternates between which coil is used on the bridge humbucker. makes a huge, brighter difference on the sound which is not common with their new models. Guitar will be shipped with the neck off to avoid additional cracks
Title: Bc Rich Platinum Strat ST-III Guitar free shipping Damaged/Repaired
ConditionDescription: does not include tremolo bar, multiple shipping options
